"A guy will come after the Galphur?":
"The rumour the other time was
incorrect though... But I will not
give up!

With that, I have heard of a
new rumour!
This time, it will be accurate perhaps!
Please, go forth and investigate!

*Target Galphur of Lv.1 or higher"

"この前のウワサは違ったみたいだけど
まだまだ諦めたりしないんだからっ！

ってわけで新しいウワサ、手に入れたよ！
今回こそ本当かもっ！
調査、よろしくね！

※Lv.1～のガルフが対象"
